channel.title: Navigation on Insightive
channel.description: Recent content in Navigation on Insightive

item.title: How GPS Works: The Tech Behind Your Location Services
item.description: Imagine you’re in a new city. You whip out your phone, open Google Maps, and bam! Within seconds, a little blue dot appears, showing your exact location. Pretty cool, right? But how does your phone know exactly where you are, even in the middle of nowhere? That’s where GPS, or Global Positioning System, comes in—an incredible piece of technology most of us use every day without really thinking about it.
